title: SCP.pdf Project (Archived)
content:
A simple status page for the SCP.pdf project, to keep everyone on the same page and avoid redundancy.

+ Please Note

- Megaupload has been shut down by US officials with immediate effect.
[http://scparchive.wikidot.com/_pdf:_archive Temporary home of the PDFs.]

- --All Archives listed below are offline until a new location is found for them.--

--**SCP 002 to 099 -**  **[http://www.megaupload.com/?d=560LH38U Completed]**--

--**SCP 100 to 199 -**  **[http://www.megaupload.com/?d=CEND09CW Completed]**--

--**SCP 200 to 299 -**  **[http://www.megaupload.com/?d=97LJ0ZKB Completed]**--

--**SCP 300 to 399 -**  **[http://www.megaupload.com/?d=T8V9ZPB6 Completed]**--

--**SCP 400 to 499 -**  **[http://www.megaupload.com/?d=NPYXIXZC Completed]**--

--**SCP 500 to 599 -**  **[http://www.megaupload.com/?d=5TNDTD0J Provisional]**--

--**SCP 600 to 699 -** **[http://www.megaupload.com/?d=Y9U0WE6Q Provisional]**--

--**SCP 700 to 799 -** **[http://www.megaupload.com/?d=TZ8TJ3GV Completed]**--

--**SCP 800 to 899 -** //Unassigned//--

--**SCP 900 to 999 -** **[http://www.megaupload.com/?d=TXCDXHX8 Completed]**--
author: Dr Kondraki
